version_description:
- fix a crash when data passed to the chart widget was null
- fix images not being visible on iOS 14
- fix dates in the chart tooltip not being converted to local time

- chart widget was not always showing the correct line interpolation
- color in the LED widget was wrong on certain conditions
- show example data on all unconnected widgets

- fixed a bug on 2FA input fields
- fixed a bug on sending values to the things

Customized mobile dashboards layout
You can now customise the mobile layout of your Arduino Cloud dashboards. Full screen dashboards can still be optimized for use on larger displays, but now you can also create a dedicated layout for viewing on the Arduino IoT Remote smartphone app. This helps you create more compact dashboards, with higher information density and the ability to control your devices from a small screen. In order to customize your dashboards and use the new mobile layout, visit create.arduino.cc/iot.

Support for Facebook login
Now the app supports login with your Facebook account

Minor fixes and performance improvements
Added the support of the Scheduler Widget
